SEARCH
Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config.annotations

Annotation Interface ConfigFile

@Target(TYPE) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Documented public @interface ConfigFile
Marks a class as a configuration file. The class will be automatically loaded from and saved to the specified file.

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String
    value
    Path to the configuration file relative to plugin's data folder.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    boolean
    autoCreate
    Whether to create the file if it doesn't exist.
    String
    template
    Template file to use when creating new config.

  • Element Details

    • value

      String value
      Path to the configuration file relative to plugin's data folder. If the path ends with a supported extension (yml/yaml/json/jsonc/toml), MagicUtils can switch formats via <name>.format or magicutils.format.
      Returns:
      the file path

    • autoCreate

      boolean autoCreate
      Whether to create the file if it doesn't exist.
      Returns:
      true to auto-create, false otherwise
      Default:
      true

    • template

      String template
      Template file to use when creating new config.
      Returns:
      path to template file in resources
      Default:
      ""
